name: Hot Pot Udon Soup
description: To streamline prep time, use dried mushrooms – no chopping required!

ingredients.name: Yaki Udon Stir-Fry Seasoning or Sweet & Sour Stir-Fry Seasoning

preparation: Place pork in Round Steamer. Cover and microwave on high for 4 min.
Using Ground Meat Separator, break cooked pork into pieces. Stir in seasoning, mushrooms, chicken broth, water, and noodles. Microwave uncovered for 10 min or until mushrooms have rehydrated.
Meanwhile, chop green onions. When soup is cooked, stir in green onions. Divide into 4 bowls and add toppings, if desired.
tips: Dried mushrooms pack big flavour and there’s no chopping required! Recipe also works well with fresh mushrooms. Sauté 4 cups of sliced mushrooms, your choice, then add to steamer with beef.
